tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
This is a human MGM that facilitates manual segmentation correction by providing a human with a Structure Metadata editor. Note that, if the tool is run by a job submitted from AMP, the context parameter will be automatically generated by AMP; any user defined value will be overwritten.
